name: Transpose
summary: You switch places with your eidolon.
description:
You switch places with your eidolon. You each teleport to the other's position.

Special This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

Conjuration: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the conjuration school of magic, typically involving summoning, creation, teleportation, or moving things from place to place.Manipulate: You must physically manipulate an item or make gestures to use an action with this trait. Creatures without a suitable appendage canâ€™t perform actions with this trait. Manipulate actions often trigger reactions.Teleportation: Teleportation effects allow you to instantaneously move from one point in space to another. Teleportation does not usually trigger reactions based on movement.
